text: Arsen Yegiazarian (; 18 May 1970 – 20 April 2020) was an Armenian chess player. He was born in Yerevan. He became a Grandmaster in 2000, and a FIDE senior trainer in 2010–11. He was part of winning team of 1995's European Chess Club Cup. He also competed at the Chess Olympiad in 1994 and 1996. Yegiazarian died on 20 April 2020 at the age of 49. ==References== ==Other websites== *Arsen Yegiazarian rating card at FIDE Category:1970 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Armenian chess players Category:Chess grandmasters Category:People from Yerevan Category:21st-century Armenian people Category:20th-century Armenian people
title: Arsen Yegiazarian
